title: The Mughal Empire Trail
description: Follow the journey of the Mughal emperors through their most iconic architectural marvels, from grand mausoleums to towering minarets.

title: Southern Temple Wonders
description: Explore the breathtaking Dravidian architectural style and rich history of South India's most celebrated temple complexes.

title: The Path of Buddhism
description: Discover the ancient roots of Buddhism in India by visiting its most serene and historically significant stupas and caves.
